---

# addApiKey

Adds a pre-generated API key to the logged in user's account. This
API key will be allowed to take actions on behalf of the user by
stamping with its associated private key.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Usage

```ts
// To generate a new keypair:
const ecdh = createECDH("prime256v1");
ecdh.generateKeys();
const publicKey = ecdh.getPublicKey("hex", "compressed");
const privateKey = ecdh.getPrivateKey("hex");
```

## Parameters

### params

`AddApiKeyParams`
Parameters for adding the API key.

### params.name

`string`
Name of the API key.

### params.publicKey

`string`
Public key to be used.

### params.expirationSec

`number`
Number of seconds until the key expires.
